==Open Flash Chart==

===Setting Chart Type===
{{{
$grid->setChartType('pie');
}}}

====Char Types====
 * Pie
 * Line  
 * Bar  
 * !Bar_Glass  
 * !Bar_3d  
 * !Bar_Filled 

===Setting Column Labels===
{{{
$grid->setXLabels('column');//Any column from the query
}}}


===Setting Script Location===
{{{
$grid->setFilesLocation(array('js'=>'URL','json'=>'URL','flash'=>'URL'))
}}}

===Setting Script Dimensions===
{{{
$grid->setChartDimensions(X,Y);
}}}

===Setting Title===
{{{
$grid->setTitle('My Title');
}}}

===Setting Chart Options===
{{{
$grid->setChartOptions(array()); //Just a wrapper for original OFC methods.
}}}

===Setting Values===
{{{
$grid->addValues('column',array('options'));
}}}

<font color="red">*NOTE: *</font>The array options is just a wrapper for the available methods from the Open Flash Chart Class. The only custom value it accepts is
{{{
chartType
}}}
to define a cart type different from the previous defined
